description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It's a twin stick shooter.  Fly with the left thumbstick, shoot with the right.  Choose one of 4 scout ships and try to survive against swarms of fighters, enormous capital ships, and space centipedes.
description.short: It's a twin stick shooter.  Fly with the left thumbstick, shoot with the right.  Choose one of 4 scout ships and try to survive against swarms of fighters, enormous capital ships, and space centipedes.
